question: How many PLAY PANELS are chosen to determine your prize?
How many paying games will there be (viz. games in which you can earn money)?
Imagine you have selected A for games 1-5 in a play panel and then select B for game 6 in the same play panel. What must you select for the rest of the games within this play panel?
choice1: Select A or B for all the remaining games
choice2: Only select B for the remaining games
choice3: Only select A for the remaining games

question: How is the paying game and the number that determines your prize selected?
choice1: They are set the same every time
